title: Sampler, 1790
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description: Ornamental border enclosing alphabets and numerals and detached motifs including shepherd and shepherdess, woman with children, Adam and Eve, flowers, and a camel.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1790.Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave. 1931-47-9.
